Two entities founded by Oprah Winfrey: O, the Oprah Magazine" and the Oprah Winfrey Network, published an article promoting the pro-choice online campaign #ShoutYourAbortion.
Winfrey is not the editor: in-chief of "O, the Oprah Magazine" and she did not personally make any statement about the #ShoutYourAbortion campaign, supportive or otherwise.
